snippet: Nick Kyrgios already was flexing his injured right hip before a game late in the first set of his third-round match at the U.S. Open. Then came a wild point that ended with him skidding to a stop on his knees on the sideline....
lead_paragraph: Nick Kyrgios already was flexing his injured right hip before a game late in the first set of his third-round match at the U.S. Open. Then came a wild point that ended with him skidding to a stop on his knees on the sideline.

headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Stops With Injury at US Open; Marchenko Into 4th Rd
headline.main: Kyrgios Stops With Injury at US Open; Marchenko Into 4th Rd
